description:
Shred it like you mean it in our Women's Ski Targeted Cushion Extra Stretch Over the Calf Socks. Made with Smartwool’s most advanced sock technologies, like Indestructawool for enhanced durability, a Virtually Seamless toe for enhanced comfort, and our 4 Degree elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit. These socks also have a narrower heel and slimmer, women’s-specific fit, and extra stretch around the calves. Body-mapped mesh zones add breathability plus targeted cushion where you need it most. Now get out there and dominate the slopes.

  • Extra stretch calf for greater comfort that accommodates fuller calves
  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
  • Wider welt for secure fit and comfort
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Women's specific fit: narrower heel and slimmer fit
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Extra Stretch OTC Socks - Women's
